billEvents.eventText: REFERRED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS

title: Provides authorization to grant certain exemptions from real property tax for school districts to certain veterans
summary: Provides authorization to grant certain exemptions from real property tax for school districts to eligible veterans where such exemption is adopted by the governing body of the school district.
currentCommittee: VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS
actClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to authorizing certain exemptions from school district real property for veterans
